mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_chip_record ( card, type, `before`, `change`, `after`, before_th, change_th, after_th, bet_id, remark, create_by, create_time ) values( #{card}, #{type}, #{before}, #{change}, #{after}, #{beforeTh}, #{changeTh}, #{afterTh}, #{betId}, #{remark}, #{createBy}, sysdate() )

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO sys_chip_record ( card, type, `before`, `change`, `after`, before_th, change_th, after_th, remark, create_by, create_time ) values( #{item.card}, #{item.type}, #{item.before}, #{item.change}, #{item.after}, #{item.beforeTh}, #{item.changeTh}, #{item.afterTh}, #{item.remark}, #{item.createBy}, sysdate() )
